instruction: Describe the setting of the given narrative in detail.
input: Once upon a time, there were two princes who were best friends.
output: The setting of the narrative was within the stone walls of a majestic castle in the kingdom of Corona. The grounds of the castle were filled with lush gardens and blooming flowers. The two princes, surrounded by their loyal friends, spent their days in the grand halls of the castle, laughing and playing in their own secret world of adventure. Outside of their adventures, the princes enjoyed exploring the cobblestone streets of the nearby village, full of friendly faces and vibrant stories.
